trans-unit.source: pandas_type is the logical type of the column, and is one of:
trans-unit.target: pandas_type 是列的逻辑类型，并且是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: period_range: fixed frequency date range generated from a time rule or DateOffset. An ndarray of Period objects, representing timespans
trans-unit.target: period_range ：从时间规则或DateOffset生成的固定频率日期范围。 Period 对象的ndarray ，代表时间跨度

trans-unit.source: pytest.mark can be used to set metadata on test functions, e.g. skip or xfail.
trans-unit.target: pytest.mark 可用于在测试功能上设置元数据，例如 skip 或 xfail 。

trans-unit.source: raise : allow exceptions to be raised
trans-unit.target: raise ：允许引发异常

trans-unit.source: read_csv and to_csv, as they are complementary
trans-unit.target: read_csv 和 to_csv ，因为它们是互补的

trans-unit.source: register_dataframe_accessor,register_index_accessor
trans-unit.target: register_dataframe_accessor,register_index_accessor

trans-unit.source: register_dataframe_accessor,register_series_accessor
trans-unit.target: register_dataframe_accessor,register_series_accessor

trans-unit.source: register_series_accessor,register_index_accessor
trans-unit.target: register_series_accessor,register_index_accessor

trans-unit.source: reindex: Does any pre-conversion of the input index then calls get_indexer
trans-unit.target: reindex ：对输入索引进行任何预转换，然后调用 get_indexer

trans-unit.source: removals must be included in the old categories. Values which were in the removed categories will be set to NaN
trans-unit.target: removals 必须包括在旧类别中。已删除类别中的值将设置为NaN

trans-unit.source: right: Another DataFrame or named Series object.
trans-unit.target: right ：另一个DataFrame或命名为Series的对象。

trans-unit.source: right_index: Same usage as left_index for the right DataFrame or Series
trans-unit.target: right_index ：相同的使用作为 left_index 为正确的数据帧或系列

trans-unit.source: right_on: Columns or index levels from the right DataFrame or Series to use as keys. Can either be column names, index level names, or arrays with length equal to the length of the DataFrame or Series.
trans-unit.target: right_on ：右侧DataFrame或Series中用作键的列或索引级别。可以是列名称，索引级别名称，也可以是长度等于DataFrame或Series长度的数组。

trans-unit.source: row<n> where n is the numeric position of the row
trans-unit.target: row<n> 其中 n 是行的数字位置

trans-unit.source: self and other are equal.
trans-unit.target: self 与 other 平等。

trans-unit.source: self or other has length 0.
trans-unit.target: self 或 other 人的长度为0。

trans-unit.source: sep other than a single character (e.g. regex separators)
trans-unit.target: sep 除单个字符外的sep（例如正则表达式分隔符）

trans-unit.source: sep=None with delim_whitespace=False
trans-unit.target: sep=None ， delim_whitespace=False

trans-unit.source: skipfooter higher than 0
trans-unit.target: skipfooter 高于0

trans-unit.source: slepian (needs width)
trans-unit.target: slepian （需要宽度）

trans-unit.source: slice_locs: returns the “range” to slice between two labels
trans-unit.target: slice_locs ：返回“范围”以切片两个标签之间

trans-unit.source: sort: Sort the result DataFrame by the join keys in lexicographical order. Defaults to True, setting to False will improve performance substantially in many cases.
trans-unit.target: sort ：按字典顺序按连接键对结果DataFrame进行排序。默认为 True ，设置为 False 在许多情况下会大大提高性能。

trans-unit.source: stack: “pivot” a level of the (possibly hierarchical) column labels, returning a DataFrame with an index with a new inner-most level of row labels.
trans-unit.target: stack ：“透视”某个级别的（可能是分层的）列标签，返回一个带有索引的 DataFrame ，该索引带有一个新的最内层的行标签。

trans-unit.source: suffixes: A tuple of string suffixes to apply to overlapping columns. Defaults to ('_x', '_y').
trans-unit.target: suffixes ：字符串后缀的元组，适用于重叠的列。默认为 ('_x', '_y') 。

trans-unit.source: symmetric_difference contains elements that appear in either idx1 or idx2 but not both. Equivalent to the Index created by idx1.difference(idx2) | idx2.difference(idx1) with duplicates dropped.
trans-unit.target: symmetric_difference 包含出现在 idx1 或 idx2 中的元素，但不能同时出现在两个元素中。等效于由 idx1.difference(idx2) | idx2.difference(idx1) 创建的索引| 删除重复项的idx2.difference（idx1）。

trans-unit.source: table_styles are extremely flexible, but not as fun to type out by hand. We hope to collect some useful ones either in pandas, or preferable in a new package that builds on top the tools here.
trans-unit.target: table_styles 非常灵活，但是手动键入却不那么有趣。我们希望以大熊猫的形式收集一些有用的信息，或者最好以基于此处工具的新软件包收集一些有用的信息。

trans-unit.source: table_styles should be a list of dictionaries. Each dictionary should have the selector and props keys. The value for selector should be a valid CSS selector. Recall that all the styles are already attached to an id, unique to each Styler. This selector is in addition to that id. The value for props should be a list of tuples of ('attribute', 'value').
trans-unit.target: table_styles 应该是词典列表。每个字典应具有 selector 和 props 键。 selector 的值应为有效的CSS选择器。回想一下，所有样式都已经附加到每个 Styler 唯一的 id 上。此选择器是该 id 之外的选择器。 props 的值应为 ('attribute', 'value') 的元组列表。

trans-unit.source: take: Analogous to ndarray.take
trans-unit.target: take ：类似于ndarray.take

trans-unit.source: target=None, but the expression is multiline.
trans-unit.target: target=None ，但表达式为多行。

trans-unit.source: timedelta: {'unit': 'ns'}. The 'unit' is optional, and if omitted it is assumed to be nanoseconds. This metadata is optional altogether
trans-unit.target: timedelta ： {'unit': 'ns'} 。该 'unit' 是可选的，并且如果省略它被假定为纳秒。此元数据完全是可选的

trans-unit.source: tm.assert_series_equal (and its counter part tm.assert_frame_equal), for pandas object comparisons.
trans-unit.target: tm.assert_series_equal （及其对立部分 tm.assert_frame_equal ），用于熊猫对象比较。

trans-unit.source: unicode: {'encoding': encoding}
trans-unit.target: unicode ： {'encoding': encoding}

trans-unit.source: union, intersection: computes the union or intersection of two Index objects
trans-unit.target: union ， intersection ：计算两个索引对象的联合或交集

trans-unit.source: union_categoricals also works with a CategoricalIndex, or Series containing categorical data, but note that the resulting array will always be a plain Categorical
trans-unit.target: union_categoricals 还可以与 CategoricalIndex 或包含分类数据的 Series 一起使用，但是请注意，结果数组将始终是普通的 Categorical

trans-unit.source: union_categoricals also works with the case of combining two categoricals of the same categories and order information (e.g. what you could also append for).
trans-unit.target: union_categoricals 也可用于将两个具有相同类别和顺序信息（例如您还可以 append 的信息）的分类组合在一起的情况。

trans-unit.source: unstack: (inverse operation of stack) “pivot” a level of the (possibly hierarchical) row index to the column axis, producing a reshaped DataFrame with a new inner-most level of column labels.
trans-unit.target: unstack ：（ stack 逆操作）将（可能是分层的）行索引的某个级别“透视”到列轴，从而生成具有新的最里面的列标签级别的 DataFrame 。

trans-unit.source: validate : string, default None. If specified, checks if merge is of specified type.

trans-unit.source: pandas existing test structure is mostly classed based, meaning that you will typically find tests wrapped in a class.
trans-unit.target: pandas现有的测试结构主要基于分类，这意味着您通常会发现包装在类中的测试。

trans-unit.source: pandas follows the PEP8 standard and uses Black and Flake8 to ensure a consistent code format throughout the project.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫遵循PEP8标准，并使用Black和Flake8确保整个项目中一致的代码格式。

trans-unit.source: pandas is serious about testing and strongly encourages contributors to embrace test-driven development (TDD). This development process “relies on the repetition of a very short development cycle: first the developer writes an (initially failing) automated test case that defines a desired improvement or new function, then produces the minimum amount of code to pass that test.” So, before actually writing any code, you should write your tests. Often the test can be taken from the original GitHub issue. However, it is always worth considering additional use cases and writing corresponding tests.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫非常重视测试，并大力鼓励贡献者采用测试驱动的开发（TDD）。此开发过程“依赖于非常短的开发周期的重复：首先，开发人员编写一个（最初失败的）自动测试用例，该用例定义了所需的改进或新功能，然后生成最少的代码以通过该测试。” 因此，在实际编写任何代码之前，您应该编写测试。通常可以从原始GitHub问题中进行测试。但是，始终值得考虑其他用例并编写相应的测试。

trans-unit.source: pandas uses isort to standardise import formatting across the codebase.
trans-unit.target: pandas使用isort在整个代码库中标准化导入格式。

trans-unit.source: pandas is a Python package providing fast, flexible, and expressive data structures designed to make working with “relational” or “labeled” data both easy and intuitive. It aims to be the fundamental high-level building block for doing practical, real world data analysis in Python. Additionally, it has the broader goal of becoming the most powerful and flexible open source data analysis / manipulation tool available in any language. It is already well on its way toward this goal.
trans-unit.target: pandas是一个Python软件包，提供快速，灵活和富于表现力的数据结构，旨在使使用“关系”或“标记”数据既简单又直观。它旨在成为在Python中进行实用，真实世界数据分析的基本高级构建块。此外，其更广泛的目标是成为任何语言中可用的最强大，最灵活的开源数据分析/操纵工具。它已经朝着这个目标迈进了。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame in pandas is analogous to a SAS data set - a two-dimensional data source with labeled columns that can be of different types. As will be shown in this document, almost any operation that can be applied to a data set using SAS’s DATA step, can also be accomplished in pandas.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫中的 DataFrame 类似于SAS数据集-带有标记列的二维数据源，该列可以是不同类型。如本文档中将显示的那样，几乎所有可以使用SAS的 DATA 步骤应用于数据集的操作都可以在熊猫中完成。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame in pandas is analogous to a Stata data set – a two-dimensional data source with labeled columns that can be of different types. As will be shown in this document, almost any operation that can be applied to a data set in Stata can also be accomplished in pandas.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫中的 DataFrame 类似于Stata数据集–带有标签列的二维数据源，列的类型可以不同。如本文档所示，几乎所有可以应用于Stata中的数据集的操作都可以在熊猫中完成。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with one row for each match, and one column for each group. Its rows have a MultiIndex with first levels that come from the subject Series. The last level is named ‘match’ and indexes the matches in each item of the Series. Any capture group names in regular expression pat will be used for column names; otherwise capture group numbers will be used.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DataFrame ，每个匹配项有一行，每组有一列。它的行具有一个 MultiIndex ，其第一级来自主题 Series 。最后一个级别称为'match'，并在 Series 的每个项目中索引匹配项。正则表达式pat中的任何捕获组名称都将用作列名称；否则将使用捕获组号。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame, in the case of a MultiIndex in the columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DataFrame 中为MultiIndex， MultiIndex 。

trans-unit.source: A Series is the data structure that represents one column of a DataFrame. SAS doesn’t have a separate data structure for a single column, but in general, working with a Series is analogous to referencing a column in the DATA step.
trans-unit.target: 甲 Series 是数据结构，它表示一个的一列 DataFrame 。SAS没有针对单个列的单独数据结构，但是通常，使用 Series 类似于在 DATA 步骤中引用列。

trans-unit.source: A Series is the data structure that represents one column of a DataFrame. Stata doesn’t have a separate data structure for a single column, but in general, working with a Series is analogous to referencing a column of a data set in Stata.

trans-unit.target: 一个带有一个参数的 callable 函数（调用Series或DataFrame），并返回有效的输出以进行索引（上述之​​一）。

trans-unit.source: A callable function with one argument (the calling Series or DataFrame) and that returns valid output for indexing (one of the above). This is useful in method chains, when you don’t have a reference to the calling object, but would like to base your selection on some value.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有一个参数的 callable 函数（调用Series或DataFrame），并返回有效的输出以进行索引（上述之​​一）。当您没有对调用对象的引用，但希望基于某个值进行选择时，这在方法链中很有用。

trans-unit.source: A re module flag, for example re.IGNORECASE. These allow to modify regular expression matching for things like case, spaces, etc. Multiple flags can be combined with the bitwise OR operator, for example re.IGNORECASE | re.MULTILINE.
trans-unit.target: 一个 re 模块标志，例如 re.IGNORECASE 。这些允许修改正则表达式匹配，例如大小写，空格等。多个标志可以与按位OR运算符组合，例如 re.IGNORECASE | re.MULTILINE 。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame of the two merged objects.
trans-unit.target: 两个合并对象的DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame that contains each stub name as a variable, with new index (i, j).
trans-unit.target: 一个DataFrame,其中包含每个存根名称作为一个变量,新的索引(i,j)。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame that must have the same length as self.
trans-unit.target: 一个DataFrame,其长度必须与self相同。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame where all columns are the same type (e.g., int64) results in an array of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 一个DataFrame,其中所有的列都是相同的类型(例如int64),结果是一个相同类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with mixed type columns(e.g., str/object, int64, float32) results in an ndarray of the broadest type that accommodates these mixed types (e.g., object).
trans-unit.target: 具有混合类型列(例如,str/对象,int64,float32)的DataFrame的结果是一个最广泛的类型的ndarray,它可以容纳这些混合类型(例如,对象)。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with one row for each subject string, and one column for each group. Any capture group names in regular expression pat will be used for column names; otherwise capture group numbers will be used. The dtype of each result column is always object, even when no match is found. If expand=False and pat has only one capture group, then return a Series (if subject is a Series) or Index (if subject is an Index).
trans-unit.target: 一个DataFrame，每个主题字符串一行，每组一行一列。正则表达式pat中的任何捕获组名称都将用作列名称；否则将使用捕获组号。即使未找到匹配项，每个结果列的dtype始终是对象。如果 expand=False ,并且pat只有一个捕获组，则返回一个系列（如果主题是一个系列）或索引（如果主题是一个索引）。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with the affected columns rounded to the specified number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 一个DataFrame,受影响的列四舍五入到指定的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: A DataFrame with the same values stored as dense arrays.
trans-unit.target: 一个具有相同数值的DataFrame存储为密集数组。

trans-unit.source: A Grouper allows the user to specify a groupby instruction for a target object
trans-unit.target: Grouper允许用户为目标对象指定一个groupby指令。

trans-unit.source: A NumPy array is returned when subplots is True.
trans-unit.target: 当 subplots True 时，将返回NumPy数组。

trans-unit.source: A NumPy array representing the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表基础数据的NumPy数组。

trans-unit.source: A NumPy ndarray representing the values in this Series or Index.
trans-unit.target: 一个NumPy ndarray,表示该系列或索引中的数值。

trans-unit.source: A PeriodDtype instance from which to extract a freq. If both freq and dtype are specified, then the frequencies must match.
trans-unit.target: 从中提取 freq 的 PeriodDtype实例。如果同时指定了 freq 和 dtype ，则频率必须匹配。

trans-unit.source: A Python docstring is a string used to document a Python module, class, function or method, so programmers can understand what it does without having to read the details of the implementation.
trans-unit.target: Python docstring 是用于记录 Python 模块、类、函数或方法的字符串,因此程序员可以理解它的功能,而不必阅读实现的细节。

trans-unit.source: A Python function, to be called on each of the axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 一个Python函数,可以在每个轴标签上调用。

trans-unit.source: A SAS data set can be built from specified values by placing the data after a datalines statement and specifying the column names.
trans-unit.target: 通过将数据放在 datalines 语句之后并指定列名称，可以从指定的值构建SAS数据集。

trans-unit.source: A SQL table is returned as two-dimensional data structure with labeled axes.
trans-unit.target: SQL表以带有标签轴的二维数据结构返回。

trans-unit.source: A Series and a scalar where.
trans-unit.target: 一个级数和一个标量 where 。

trans-unit.source: A Series of booleans indicating whether the given pattern matches the end of each string element.
trans-unit.target: 一系列表示给定模式是否与每个字符串元素的末尾相匹配的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A Series of booleans indicating whether the given pattern matches the start of each string element.
trans-unit.target: 表示给定模式是否与每个字符串元素的开始相匹配的一系列布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A Series or Index of boolean values indicating whether the given pattern is contained within the string of each element of the Series or Index.
trans-unit.target: 一个系列或索引的布尔值,表示给定模式是否包含在系列或索引的每个元素的字符串中。

trans-unit.source: A Series or Index of integer values indicating the length of each element in the Series or Index.
trans-unit.target: 一个系列或索引的整数值,表示该系列或索引中每个元素的长度。

trans-unit.source: A Series that must have the same length as self.
trans-unit.target: 一个系列,必须与自己的长度相同。

trans-unit.source: A Series whose index is the original column names and whose values is the memory usage of each column in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 一个系列,其索引是原始列名,其值是每一列的内存使用量,单位是字节。

trans-unit.source: A Stata data set can be built from specified values by placing the data after an input statement and specifying the column names.
trans-unit.target: 通过将数据放置在 input 语句之后并指定列名称，可以从指定值构建Stata数据集。

trans-unit.source: A URL, a file-like object, or a raw string containing HTML. Note that lxml only accepts the http, ftp and file url protocols. If you have a URL that starts with 'https' you might try removing the 's'.
trans-unit.target: URL，类似文件的对象或包含HTML的原始字符串。请注意，lxml仅接受http，ftp和文件url协议。如果您的网址以 'https' 开头，则可以尝试删除 's' 。

trans-unit.source: A ValueError is raised if there are any duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何重复,就会引发ValueError。

trans-unit.source: A Window sub-classed for the particular operation.
trans-unit.target: 特定操作的窗口子类。

trans-unit.source: A bar plot is a plot that presents categorical data with rectangular bars with lengths proportional to the values that they represent. A bar plot shows comparisons among discrete categories. One axis of the plot shows the specific categories being compared, and the other axis represents a measured value.
trans-unit.target: 条形图是一种用长度与其所代表的数值成正比的矩形条来表示分类数据的图。条形图显示的是离散类别之间的比较。图中的一根轴显示被比较的具体类别,另一根轴代表测量值。

trans-unit.source: A black list of data types to omit from the result. Ignored for Series. Here are the options:
trans-unit.target: 要从结果中忽略的数据类型黑名单。忽略 Series 。以下是选项：

trans-unit.source: A blank line is left between the short summary and the extended summary. And every paragraph in the extended summary is finished by a dot.
trans-unit.target: 在简短摘要和扩展摘要之间留有一条空行。而扩展摘要中的每一段都用一个点来结束。

trans-unit.source: A boolean array
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔数组

trans-unit.source: A boolean array of the same length as the axis being sliced, e.g. [True, False, True].
trans-unit.target: 一个与被切轴长度相同的布尔数组，例如 [True, False, True] 。

trans-unit.source: A boolean array of whether my values are NA.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔数组,表示我的值是否为NA。

trans-unit.source: A boolean array.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔数组。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating if a scalar Interval is empty, or a boolean ndarray positionally indicating if an Interval in an IntervalArray or IntervalIndex is empty.
trans-unit.target: 的布尔值指示是否一个标 Interval 为空，或者一个布尔 ndarray 位置上，指示如果 Interval 在 IntervalArray 或 IntervalIndex 是空的。

trans-unit.source: A boolean indicating if a scalar Interval is empty, or a boolean ndarray positionally indicating if an Interval in an IntervalArray or IntervalIndex is empty.
trans-unit.target: 的布尔值指示是否一个标 Interval 为空，或者一个布尔 ndarray 位置上，指示如果 Interval 在 IntervalArray 或 IntervalIndex 是空的。

trans-unit.source: A bounded slice-like interval; the elements of an IntervalArray.
trans-unit.target: 一个有界的片状区间;IntervalArray的元素。

trans-unit.source: A bounded slice-like interval; the elements of an IntervalIndex.
trans-unit.target: 一个有界的片状区间;IntervalIndex的元素。

trans-unit.source: A box plot is a method for graphically depicting groups of numerical data through their quartiles. The box extends from the Q1 to Q3 quartile values of the data, with a line at the median (Q2). The whiskers extend from the edges of box to show the range of the data. The position of the whiskers is set by default to 1.5*IQR (IQR = Q3 - Q1) from the edges of the box. Outlier points are those past the end of the whiskers.
trans-unit.target: 箱形图是一种通过四分位数以图形方式描述数字数据组的方法。箱子从数据的Q1到Q3的四分位值延伸,中位数(Q2)是一条线。蚕须从方框的边缘延伸,以显示数据的范围。晶须的位置默认设置为从方框边缘开始的1.5*IQR(IQR=Q3-Q1)。离群点是指过了晶须末端的点。

trans-unit.source: A call to one of the .set_ or .hide_ methods, e.g. .set_caption or .hide_columns
trans-unit.target: 调用 .set_ 或 .hide_ 方法之一，例如 .set_caption 或 .hide_columns

trans-unit.source: A callable that gets instances of the scalar type and returns a string. By default, repr() is used when boxed=False and str() is used when boxed=True.
trans-unit.target: 可调用的可获取标量类型的实例并返回一个字符串。默认情况下， repr() 当使用 boxed=False 和 str() 当使用 boxed=True 。

trans-unit.source: A callable that takes a dataframe as its first argument, and returns a dataframe, a series or a scalar. In addition the callable may take positional and keyword arguments.
trans-unit.target: 以数据帧为第一个参数,并返回一个数据帧、一个序列或一个标量的可调用。此外,callable还可以接受位置参数和关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: A categorical array.
trans-unit.target: 一个分类数组。

trans-unit.source: A character code (one of ‘biufcmMOSUV’), default ‘O’
trans-unit.target: 字符代码（“ biufcmMOSUV”之一），默认为“ O”

trans-unit.source: A character indicating the separation of the variable names in the wide format, to be stripped from the names in the long format. For example, if your column names are A-suffix1, A-suffix2, you can strip the hyphen by specifying sep=’-‘
trans-unit.target: 一个字符，指示宽格式变量名的分隔，将从长格式名中删除。例如，如果您的列名是A-suffix1，A-suffix2，则可以通过指定 sep=’-‘ 来去除连字符。

trans-unit.source: A class decorator.
trans-unit.target: 一个班级的装饰者。

trans-unit.source: A closed interval (in mathematics denoted by square brackets) contains its endpoints, i.e. the closed interval [0, 5] is characterized by the conditions 0 <= x <= 5. This is what closed='both' stands for. An open interval (in mathematics denoted by parentheses) does not contain its endpoints, i.e. the open interval (0, 5) is characterized by the conditions 0 < x < 5. This is what closed='neither' stands for. Intervals can also be half-open or half-closed, i.e. [0, 5) is described by 0 <= x < 5 (closed='left') and (0, 5] is described by 0 < x <= 5 (closed='right').
trans-unit.target: 闭合区间（在数学中由方括号表示）包含其端点，即闭合区间 [0, 5] 的特征是条件 0 <= x <= 5 。这就是 closed='both' 的意思。开放区间（在用括号表示的数学中）不包含其端点，即开放区间 (0, 5) 的条件为 0 < x < 5 。这就是 closed='neither' 代表的意思。间隔也可以是半开或半关，即 [0, 5) 用 0 <= x < 5 （ closed='left' ）描述， (0, 5] 用 0 < x <= 5 = 5 （ closed='right' ）。

trans-unit.source: A collection of intervals may be stored in an arrays.IntervalArray.
trans-unit.target: 间隔的集合可以存储在 arrays.IntervalArray 中。

trans-unit.source: A collection of timedeltas may be stored in a arrays.PeriodArray. Every period in a PeriodArray must have the same freq.
trans-unit.target: timedelta的集合可以存储在 arrays.PeriodArray 中。 PeriodArray 中的每个句点必须具有相同的 freq 。

trans-unit.source: A collection of timedeltas may be stored in a TimedeltaArray.
trans-unit.target: timedelta的集合可以存储在 TimedeltaArray 中。

trans-unit.source: A collection of timestamps may be stored in a arrays.DatetimeArray. For timezone-aware data, the .dtype of a DatetimeArray is a DatetimeTZDtype. For timezone-naive data, np.dtype("datetime64[ns]") is used.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳的集合可以存储在 arrays.DatetimeArray 中。对于时区感知的数据，该 .dtype 一个的 DatetimeArray 是 DatetimeTZDtype 。对于未使用时区的数据，使用 np.dtype("datetime64[ns]") 。

trans-unit.source: A column name or position whose values will be used to color the marker points according to a colormap.
trans-unit.target: 一个列名或位置,其值将用于根据colormap对标记点进行着色。

trans-unit.target: 逗号分隔值(csv)文件以带有标签轴的二维数据结构返回。

trans-unit.target: 简洁的教程与实际案例

trans-unit.target: 使用这种图表时需要考虑的问题是,方框和晶须可能会重叠,这在绘制小数据集时非常常见。

trans-unit.target: 对象的副本，其中所有匹配出现的 pat 都替换为 repl 。

trans-unit.target: 用来作为文件创建日期的日期时间。默认为当前时间。

trans-unit.target: item-> dtype的字典，如果可能的话，将向下转换，或者是字符串“ infer”，它将尝试将其转换为适当的相等类型（例如，如果可能，则从float64到int64）。

trans-unit.target: keys 参数的一种常见用法是在基于现有 Series 创建新的 DataFrame 时重写列名称。请注意，默认行为是如何让存在的 DataFrame 继承父 Series 名称的。

trans-unit.target: 直方图表示数据分布。此函数将DataFrame中所有给定Series的值分组为bin，并将所有bin绘制到一个 matplotlib.axes.Axes 中。当DataFrame系列的规模相似时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: A list of tuples giving the extents of the fixed-width fields of each line as half-open intervals (i.e., [from, to[ ). String value ‘infer’ can be used to instruct the parser to try detecting the column specifications from the first 100 rows of the data which are not being skipped via skiprows (default=’infer’).
trans-unit.target: 以元组列表形式给出每行固定宽度字段的范围作为半开间隔（即[from，to [）。字符串值“ infer”可用于指示解析器尝试从数据的前100行中检测列规范，该行未通过跳过行跳过（默认=“ infer”）。

trans-unit.source: All pandas data structures are value-mutable (the values they contain can be altered) but not always size-mutable. The length of a Series cannot be changed, but, for example, columns can be inserted into a DataFrame. However, the vast majority of methods produce new objects and leave the input data untouched. In general we like to favor immutability where sensible.
trans-unit.target: 所有的熊猫数据结构都是值可变的（它们包含的值可以更改），但并不总是大小可变的。系列的长度不能更改，但是，例如，可以将列插入到DataFrame中。但是，绝大多数方法都会产生新的对象，并保持输入数据不变。总的来说，我们希望在合理的地方支持不变性。

trans-unit.source: All remaining variables in the data frame are left intact.
trans-unit.target: 数据框中所有剩余的变量都保持不变。

trans-unit.target: 所有测试都应进入特定程序包的 tests 子目录。此文件夹包含许多当前的测试示例，建议您从中寻求启发。如果您的测试需要使用文件或网络连接，则Wiki 的测试页面上有更多信息。

trans-unit.target: 分类数据的所有值都在 categories 或 np.nan 中。顺序由 categories 的顺序定义，而不是值的词汇顺序。在内部，该数据结构由一个的 categories 阵列和的整数数组 codes ，其指向在现实值 categories 阵列。

trans-unit.source: Also, we would like sensible default behaviors for the common API functions which take into account the typical orientation of time series and cross-sectional data sets. When using ndarrays to store 2- and 3-dimensional data, a burden is placed on the user to consider the orientation of the data set when writing functions; axes are considered more or less equivalent (except when C- or Fortran-contiguousness matters for performance). In pandas, the axes are intended to lend more semantic meaning to the data; i.e., for a particular data set there is likely to be a “right” way to orient the data. The goal, then, is to reduce the amount of mental effort required to code up data transformations in downstream functions.
trans-unit.target: 另外，我们希望通用API函数具有合理的默认行为，并考虑到时间序列和横截面数据集的典型方向。当使用ndarray来存储2维和3维数据时，用户在编写函数时要考虑数据集的方向是一个负担。轴或多或少被认为是等效的（C或Fortran连续性对性能至关重要时除外）。在熊猫中，轴旨在为数据赋予更多的语义含义。也就是说，对于特定的数据集，可能存在一种“正确”的方式来定向数据。因此，目标是减少编码下游功能中的数据转换所需的精力。

trans-unit.source: Altair
trans-unit.target: Altair

trans-unit.source: Altair is a declarative statistical visualization library for Python. With Altair, you can spend more time understanding your data and its meaning. Altair’s API is simple, friendly and consistent and built on top of the powerful Vega-Lite JSON specification. This elegant simplicity produces beautiful and effective visualizations with a minimal amount of code. Altair works with Pandas DataFrames.
trans-unit.target: Altair是用于Python的声明性统计可视化库。使用Altair，您可以花费更多时间来理解数据及其含义。Altair的API简单，友好且一致，并基于强大的Vega-Lite JSON规范构建。这种优雅的简单性用最少的代码即可产生美观，有效的可视化效果。Altair可与Pandas DataFrames配合使用。

trans-unit.source: Another advantage to installing Anaconda is that you don’t need admin rights to install it. Anaconda can install in the user’s home directory, which makes it trivial to delete Anaconda if you decide (just delete that folder).
trans-unit.target: 安装Anaconda的另一个优点是您不需要管理员权限即可安装它。Anaconda可以安装在用户的主目录中，如果您决定（仅删除该文件夹），则删除Anaconda并不容易。

trans-unit.source: Another option to join using the key columns is to use the on parameter. DataFrame.join always uses other’s index but we can use any column in df. This method preserves the original DataFrame’s index in the result.
trans-unit.target: 使用键列进行连接的另一种方法是使用 on 参数。DataFrame.join始终使用 other 索引，但我们可以使用 df 中的任何列。此方法在结果中保留原始DataFrame的索引。

trans-unit.source: Another reason you might need to update your pull request is to solve conflicts with changes that have been merged into the master branch since you opened your pull request.
trans-unit.target: 另一个需要更新拉取请求的原因是为了解决与打开拉取请求后合并到主干分支的变更之间的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Any NA values will be NA in the result. Out of bounds values will be NA in the resulting Series or Categorical object.
trans-unit.target: 任何NA值在结果中都是NA。超出边界的值在结果的系列或分类对象中会是NA。

trans-unit.source: Any Series passed will have their name attributes used unless row or column names for the cross-tabulation are specified.
trans-unit.target: 除非指定了交叉表的行名或列名,否则传递的任何系列都将使用其名称属性。

trans-unit.source: Any additional keyword arguments are passed through to self.template.render. This is useful when you need to provide additional variables for a custom template.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他关键字参数都将传递到 self.template.render 。当您需要为自定义模板提供其他变量时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Any additional kwargs are passed to the engine.
trans-unit.target: 任何额外的kwargs都会传递给引擎。

trans-unit.source: Any datetime values with time zone information parsed via the parse_dates parameter will be converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 带有通过 parse_dates 参数解析的时区信息的任何datetime值都将转换为UTC。

trans-unit.source: Any datetime values with time zone information will be converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 任何带有时区信息的日期时间值将被转换为UTC。

trans-unit.source: Any expression that is a valid pandas.eval() expression is also a valid DataFrame.eval() expression, with the added benefit that you don’t have to prefix the name of the DataFrame to the column(s) you’re interested in evaluating.
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的 pandas.eval() 表达式也都是有效的 DataFrame.eval() 表达式，其好处是您不必将 DataFrame 的名称前缀在感兴趣的列上在评估中。

trans-unit.source: Any input passed containing Categorical data will have all of its categories included in the cross-tabulation, even if the actual data does not contain any instances of a particular category.
trans-unit.target: 即使实际数据不包含任何特定类别的实例，传递的所有包含类别数据的输入都将其所有类别包括在交叉列表中。

trans-unit.source: Any nanosecond resolution will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 任何纳秒级的分辨率都会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Any other form of observational / statistical data sets. The data actually need not be labeled at all to be placed into a pandas data structure
trans-unit.target: 任何其他形式的观察/统计数据集。其实数据根本不需要贴上标签就可以放入pandas数据结构中。

trans-unit.source: Any other module used in the examples must be explicitly imported, one per line (as recommended in PEP 8#imports) and avoiding aliases. Avoid excessive imports, but if needed, imports from the standard library go first, followed by third-party libraries (like matplotlib).

trans-unit.source: As data comes in many shapes and forms, pandas aims to be flexible with regard to handling missing data. While NaN is the default missing value marker for reasons of computational speed and convenience, we need to be able to easily detect this value with data of different types: floating point, integer, boolean, and general object. In many cases, however, the Python None will arise and we wish to also consider that “missing” or “not available” or “NA”.
trans-unit.target: 由于数据具有多种形状和形式，因此熊猫致力于在处理丢失的数据方面保持灵活性。尽管出于计算速度和便利性的原因， NaN 是默认的缺失值标记，但我们需要能够使用不同类型的数据轻松地检测到该值：浮点，整数，布尔值和常规对象。但是，在许多情况下，Python None 都将出现，我们也希望考虑“缺失”或“不可用”或“ NA”。

trans-unit.source: Assuming the missing data are missing at random this results in an estimate for the covariance matrix which is unbiased. However, for many applications this estimate may not be acceptable because the estimated covariance matrix is not guaranteed to be positive semi-definite. This could lead to estimated correlations having absolute values which are greater than one, and/or a non-invertible covariance matrix. See Estimation of covariance matrices for more details.
trans-unit.target: 假设丢失的数据是随机丢失的，这将导致对协方差矩阵的估计是无偏的。但是，对于许多应用而言，此估计可能不可接受，因为不能保证所估计的协方差矩阵为正半定值。这可能导致估计的相关具有绝对值大于1的绝对值和/或不可逆协方差矩阵。有关更多详细信息，请参见协方差矩阵的估计。

trans-unit.source: Be careful with DST changes. When there is sequential data, pandas can infer the DST time:
trans-unit.target: 要注意DST的变化。当有顺序数据时,大熊猫可以推断出DST时间。

trans-unit.source: Be careful with DST changes. When there is sequential data, pandas can infer the DST time: >>> s = pd.to_datetime(pd.Series([‘2018-10-28 01:30:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 02:00:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 02:30:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 02:00:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 02:30:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 03:00:00’, … ‘2018-10-28 03:30:00’])) >>> s.dt.tz_localize(‘CET’, ambiguous=’infer’) 0 2018-10-28 01:30:00+02:00 1 2018-10-28 02:00:00+02:00 2 2018-10-28 02:30:00+02:00 3 2018-10-28 02:00:00+01:00 4 2018-10-28 02:30:00+01:00 5 2018-10-28 03:00:00+01:00 6 2018-10-28 03:30:00+01:00 dtype: datetime64[ns, CET]

trans-unit.source: Bokeh
trans-unit.target: Bokeh

trans-unit.source: Bokeh is a Python interactive visualization library for large datasets that natively uses the latest web technologies. Its goal is to provide elegant, concise construction of novel graphics in the style of Protovis/D3, while delivering high-performance interactivity over large data to thin clients.
trans-unit.target: Bokeh是一个针对大型数据集的Python交互式可视化库,本机使用最新的网络技术。它的目标是以Protovis/D3的风格提供优雅、简洁的新颖图形结构,同时为瘦客户机提供大型数据的高性能交互性。

trans-unit.source: Both Styler.apply, and Styler.applymap accept a subset keyword. This allows you to apply styles to specific rows or columns, without having to code that logic into your style function.
trans-unit.target: 无论 Styler.apply 和 Styler.applymap 接受一个 subset 的关键字。这使您可以将样式应用于特定的行或列，而不必将该逻辑编码到 style 函数中。

trans-unit.source: Both DataFrames must be sorted by the key.
trans-unit.target: 两个DataFrames必须按键排序。

trans-unit.source: Both NA and null values are automatically excluded from the calculation. (See the note below about bias from missing values.) A threshold can be set for the minimum number of observations for each value created. Comparisons with observations below this threshold will be returned as NaN.
trans-unit.target: NA和null值都会自动从计算中排除。 （请参阅以下有关缺失值偏差的注释。）可以为创建的每个值的最小观察次数设置阈值。与低于此阈值的观测值的比较将返回为 NaN 。

trans-unit.source: Both Neg and Pos
trans-unit.target: 负数和正数

trans-unit.source: Both of those methods take a function (and some other keyword arguments) and applies your function to the DataFrame in a certain way. Styler.applymap works through the DataFrame elementwise. Styler.apply passes each column or row into your DataFrame one-at-a-time or the entire table at once, depending on the axis keyword argument. For columnwise use axis=0, rowwise use axis=1, and for the entire table at once use axis=None.
trans-unit.target: 这两个方法都使用一个函数（和一些其他关键字参数），并以某种方式将您的函数应用于DataFrame。 Styler.applymap 通过DataFrame逐个元素地工作。 Styler.apply 一次将每一列或每一行或一次一次将整个表传递到DataFrame中，具体取决于 axis 关键字参数。对于按列使用 axis=0 ，按行使用 axis=1 ，对于整个表一次使用 axis=None 。
